name: ColorFighter
description:
A small game that I have made.

It is a small shootergame but you can change color and you have to be the same color as the enemy to be able do damage.  More levels will come. If some one wanted to make background music that would really help.

Controls:

Q = Shoot

E = Change color

WASD = Movement

Mouseposition = Aim OBS you can just aim left and right
